infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Garage Vault needs camera access to scan and identify items for your inventory using AI.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Garage Vault needs photo library access to select images of items for your inventory.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Garage Vault needs permission to save photos of your inventory items.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Garage Vault uses location access to help organize your inventory by rooms or storage locations.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Garage Vault may access contacts to help you share inventory information or collaborate with household members.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Garage Vault to access your camera to scan items and QR codes.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Garage Vault to access your photos to select images of items.
